name: vecn
description: A module for creating n-dimensional vector types that support swizzling.

scripts.docs: jsdoc src -d docs -P ./package.json -R ./README.md -t ./node_modules/ink-docstrap/template -c docs/conf.json && rsync -a --remove-source-files docs/**/**/* docs/ && find docs -type d -empty -delete

author: Bryce Wilson
